text: Ndipo gwiritsani nonsenu, chingwe cha Mulungu ndipo musagawikane. Kumbukirani zokoma zimene Mulungu wakuchitirani chifukwa mudali mdani wa wina ndi mnzake ndipo Iye adayanjanitsa mitima yanu, ndipo chifukwa cha chisomo chake, muli achibale; ndipo inu mudali mâ€™mphepete mwadzenje la moto koma Iye adakupulumutsani ku motowo. Motero Mulungu ali kufotokoza momveka zizindikiro zake kwa inu, kuti mukhale otsogozedwa
